parsetree.*:
<root><template><title>RV</title><part><name>type</name>=<value>command

</value></part><part><name index="1"/><value> arma3

</value></part><part><name index="2"/><value>1.32

</value></part><part><name>gr1</name>=<value> Variables

</value></part><part><name index="3"/><value> A non-existing [[Script]] or script that has finished ([[scriptDone]]). To compare non-existent scripts use [[isNull]] or [[isEqualTo]]:
* <tt>[[scriptNull]] <ext><name>nowiki</name><attr/><inner>==</inner><close></nowiki></close></ext> [[scriptNull]]; // ERROR! <ext><name>nowiki</name><attr/><inner>==</inner><close></nowiki></close></ext> cannot be used with script object</tt>
* <tt>[[isNull]] [[scriptNull]]; // true</tt>
* <tt>[[scriptNull]] [[isEqualTo]] [[scriptNull]]; // true</tt>

</value></part><part><name index="4"/><value> '''scriptNull'''

</value></part><part><name index="5"/><value> [[Script]] - NULL script

		  
</value></part><part><name>x1</name>=<value> Wait until previous script is finished before starting a new one:<code>[] spawn
{
	_script = [[scriptNull]];
	[[for]] "_i" [[from]] 1 [[to]] 10 [[do]] {
		[[waitUntil]] {[[isNull]] _script};
		_script = _i [[spawn]] {
			[[hint]] [[format]] ["script %1 started", _this];
			[[sleep]] 1;
			[[hint]] [[format]] ["script %1 finished", _this];
			[[sleep]] 0.2;
		};
	};
};</code>

		  
</value></part><part><name>x2</name>=<value> <code>[[if]] ([[scriptDone]] (_obj [[getVariable]] ["objScript", [[scriptNull]]])) [[then]] {
	_obj [[setVariable]] ["objScript", _obj [[spawn]] {
		[[waitUntil]] {[[damage]] _this > 0.9};
		[[hint]] "Critical Damage!";
	}];
};</code>

</value></part><part><name> x3 </name>=<value> <code>[[str]] [[scriptNull]]; // <NULL-script></code>

</value></part><part><name>seealso</name>=<value> [[controlNull]], [[displayNull]], [[grpNull]], [[locationNull]], [[objNull]], [[taskNull]], [[teamMemberNull]], [[configNull]], [[typeName]], [[isNull]], [[scriptDone]], [[spawn]], [[execVM]]
</value></part></template>


<template lineStart="1"><title>GameCategory</title><part><name index="1"/><value>arma3</value></part><part><name index="2"/><value>Scripting Commands</value></part></template>
